dcterms:creator: A. Juliani
H. Henry
D. Lange
dcterms:description: The RollerBall environment in Unity consists of a floor, a ball, a square, and a camera. The ball acts as the agent, aiming to hit the square while avoiding falling off the floor. Successful collisions yield rewards, while failures incur penalties.
dcterms:title: Unity (RollerBall environment)

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Pettersson
J. Schneider
S. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
D. Z. D. Lange
dcterms:description: The Pendulum environment in OpenAI Gym is a classic control task where the objective is to swing a pendulum to an upright position and keep it balanced. It serves as a benchmark for testing reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym (Pendulum environment)
